welcome.title: Welcome to Wngtools
welcome.description: This is a Tauri app that supports file management and theme synchronization.
welcome.click: Click, do not show About page next time

files.dragFilesHere: Drag files here to add to the list
files.enableObjectClick: Enable clicking objects to copy to clipboard
files.enableTextClick: Enable clicking text objects to copy content to clipboard
files.enableImageClick: Enable clicking images to copy to clipboard
files.enableOtherClick: Enable clicking other files to copy file path to clipboard
